title: Ivanti security advisory (AV25-184)
description: On April 3, 2025, Ivanti published a security advisory to address a vulnerability in multiple products. Included was a critical update for the following:
products: Ivanti Connect Secure  version 22.7R2.5 and prior
Pulse Connect Secure (EoS)  version 9.1R18.9 and prior
Ivanti Policy Secure  version 22.7R1.3 and prior
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
